title: Is migration from old phone really that bad?
content:
Migrate data from previous phone is even worse than I thought! It just copies the APPs without the data and settings. Honestly Google? It's 2019!
Most apps where copied but all lost its settings and data! All logins, settings are lost!
I must have been braindead when I went for a Google phone spending so much money.
Do I really have to root the phone to get a possibility to backup and restore my stuff?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
